metadata.subject: Pétion, J. (Jérôme), 1756-1794
Club des Feuillants
metadata.title: Conduite de M. le maire de Paris, à l'occasion de la Société des Feuillans.
metadata.creator: Pétion, J. (Jérôme), 1756-1794.
Pétion, J. (Jérôme), 1756-1794
Lottin de Saint Germain, Jean-Roch, b. 1754, publisher
Lottin, Augustin-Martin, 1726-1793, publisher
metadata.publisher: [Paris] : De l'imprimerie de Lottin l'aîné, & J.-R. Lottin, imprimeurs de la municipalité,
metadata.citation: Martin & Walter. Révolution française, III, 27038; IV:2, 3726
metadata.description: Consists of letters, dated 21-16 December 1791, to and from Jérôme Pétion, concerning unrest at the Club des Feuillants
metadata.notes: No copyright. No table of contents. Title on cover. Damaged, stained pages and cover.
